query: query ListFlights($filter: ModelFlightFilterInput, $limit: Int, $nextToken: String) {  listFlights(filter: $filter, limit: $limit, nextToken: $nextToken) { items { id      departureDate      departureAirportCode      departureAirportName      departureCity      departureLocale      arrivalDate      arrivalAirportCode      arrivalAirportName      arrivalCity      arrivalLocale      ticketPrice      ticketCurrency      flightNumber      seatAllocation    }    nextToken  }}
